Description:
Is it possible to lower emissions while improving operational performance? In this preview of the Innovating for a Low-Carbon Future episode of Accelerating Sustainability Together, Jim Hanna, Director of Sustainability for Datacenter Engineering, Procurement and Construction at Microsoft, and Sara Neff, Partner/General Manager of Sustainability and ESG for Microsoft Cloud Operations + Innovation, join Don Davies, Executive Director Building Transparency at Microsoft to explore how organizations are using smart design, material innovation, and AI to drive measurable decarbonization. Watch the full episode here â†’ https://msft.it/090425

#Microsoft #MicrosoftCloud
Title: Innovating for a Low-Carbon Future | Accelerating Sustainability Together
Author: Microsoft Cloud
